toggleSpecificPlayersMenu.hint: Allows you to select a specific player to pull to the stage

quickToggleStage.id: Quick Toggle Selected Token to Stage
quickToggleStage.hint: Draws or removed select token to the stage

voice-mode.name: Voice Only Mode
voice-mode.hint: This mode changes 'Theatre Inserts' module settings to hide the textbox if your group doesn't use them

show-names.name: Show Names
show-names.hint: When toggled off this will hide Actor Names in 'Theatre Inserts' by setting the font size to 0
